channel.title: admin on Will Pan
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Will Pan

item.description: Will Pan currently is a research fellow at VISTA lab, Shenzhen University. His research interests include include Computational Geometry, 3D algorithms, Machine Learning and Computer-Aided Design. He leads the 3D VISTA group, which develops algorithms and applications in 3D scanning, 3D object recognition, mesh processing, robotic pick and place and 3D measurement. 潘威目前在深圳大学VISTA LAB，研究涉及三维视觉，计算机图形学，三维机器学习，机器人抓取，三维测量等领域的算法和应用。
